it is a really fun game to play

Pros : Gunplay, team strategy.
Cons : Gun skins gamble, updates add next to n0thing to the game, character model skins in competitive, SG op, 64 ticks matchmaking, high ping peekers advantage, patches ? why?, ranking, hit reg, voice chat flame is not punishable, no prime = all cheaters, community is garbage (cheating, encouraging bad behaviour, racism), their BR is fun but not worth playing and last but not least, no boobies tags.

Is it worth playing? [b]Yes.[/b]
Do YOU want to play? [b]Yes.[/b]
Should you buy skins? [b]Definitely.[/b]
Will you become poor doing so? [b]No doubt in my mind[/b].
Will you have fun? [b]Depends on what you count as [i]fun[/i].[/b]
